mapper.sql: id, currency_id, data_time, open, close, high, low, volume, currency_volume, granularity, create_time, EMA12, EMA26, DEA9, macd
mapper.insert: insert into kline (id, currency_id, data_time, open, close, high, low, volume, currency_volume, granularity, create_time, EMA12, EMA26, DEA9, macd) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{open,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{close,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{high,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{low,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{currencyVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{granularity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ema12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ema26,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dea9,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{macd,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update kline
currency_id = #{currencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_time = #{dataTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
open = #{open,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
close = #{close,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
high = #{high,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
low = #{low,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
volume = #{volume,jdbcType=BIGINT},
currency_volume = #{currencyVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
granularity = #{granularity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMA12 = #{ema12,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMA26 = #{ema26,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEA9 = #{dea9,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
macd = #{macd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update kline set currency_id = #{currencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_time = #{dataTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, open = #{open,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, close = #{close,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, high = #{high,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, low = #{low,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=BIGINT}, currency_volume = #{currencyVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, granularity = #{granularity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMA12 = #{ema12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMA26 = #{ema26,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEA9 = #{dea9,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, macd = #{macd,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from kline where granularity=#{granularity} order by data_time desc limit #{limit}

select
from kline where granularity=#{granularity} and data_time=#{dataTime}

select
from kline where granularity=#{granularity} and data_time > #{dataTimeBegin} and data_time < #{dataTimeEnd} order by data_time
